# Stop Using Default Values: The Real Cost of CBAM — And a One-Time PCF Path

**Default values aren't a shortcut.** They *look* convenient, but they tend to push up costs, attract customs scrutiny, and stall your working capital. The practical alternative is to **build a once-and-reusable PCF model** and reuse it across customs, buyers, and audits.

**In this article:** default-value costs · HS code data checklist · one-time PCF path · cost model · quick checklists

---

## 1) The cost of default values

- **Systematically higher tax.** Transitional default values published by the European Commission are coarse

intensities; from **2026** the regime moves to **country-average + mark-up** defaults. If your real process is cleaner than those benchmarks, **you overpay** when certificates are due. See: **[CBAM overview](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en)** and **[Default values note](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/system/files/2023-12/Default%20values%20transitional%20period.pdf)**.  
- **Audit/inspection risk.** Declarants relying on estimates/defaults face **higher review and re-filing risk** as customs tighten data expectations; rework locks **working capital** and can delay shipments.  
- **Lost commercial upside.** Buyers with **SBTi** commitments want **product-level** emissions. With defaults you **get no credit** for lower-carbon SKUs, weakening pricing power and tender win-rates. See **[SBTi guidance](https://sciencebasedtargets.org/standards-and-guidance)**.  
- **Management takeaway:** *Default values are a bridge, not a strategy.* Use them only as a stop-gap while you build a specific, evidence-backed PCF.

---

## 2) HS codes and a minimal data pack

**Higher-risk HS/CN segments under CBAM today:**  
**Iron & steel** (HS **72**, parts of **73**), **Aluminium** (**76**), **Cement** (HS **2523**), **Fertilisers** (**31**), **Hydrogen** (**2804**), **Electricity** (sector). Sector pages: **[Commission overview](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en)** · **[Per-sector info](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism/cbam-information-sector_en)**.  
> **Note on batteries (HS 85):** not in current CBAM scope, but **high-scrutiny** for buyers/DPP-ESPR/Batteries Regulation. Treat as *priority for PCF readiness* even if not CBAM-taxed today. See **[ESPR](https://commission.europa.eu/energy-climate-change-environment/standards-tools-and-labels/products-labelling-rules-and-requirements/ecodesign-sustainable-products-regulation_en)**.

**Minimal data pack per HS/CN (cradle-to-gate):**  
- **Boundary** (modules/stages covered) & **12-month** reference window  
- **Materials/BOM** (weights, grades, scrap)  
- **Process energy** by step (electricity, fuels)  
- **Main logistics legs** (inbound key feedstocks, outbound to border)  
- **Factor provenance** (factor source, version, unit; electricity grid factor or supplier-specific)  

**Rejection traps → fixes:**  
- Boundary mistakes → show a **simple boundary diagram** and module list  
- Unit inconsistency → **unit checks** + standard **templates**  
- Missing factor sources → **cite factor source/version** right in the table; keep a **factor register**

---

## 3) A one-time PCF path you can reuse everywhere

**Inputs:** product spec / BOM / energy / logistics. If a field is missing, use **industry factors** with **clearly labeled assumptions** and uncertainty.

**80/20 coverage:** model the **top emitters first** (e.g., hot metal, calcination, electrolysis power, primary ingot, key routes); iterate the long tail later.

**Deliverables (make them reusable):**  
- **Result + method** (functional unit, system boundary, allocation)  
- **Factor table** (source, version, unit), **lineage/provenance**  
- **Data-quality rating (DQR)** and **uncertainty bands**  
- **Evidence pack** (redacted invoices/meters/screenshots)  

**Reuse targets:**  
- **Customs** (CBAM registry uploads)  
- **Buyer tenders** (supplier-specific Scope 3)  
- **Audits/assurance**  
- Easy upgrades to **DPP/ESPR**, **PEF/EPD** later. See **[PEF methods](https://eplca.jrc.ec.europa.eu/EnvironmentalFootprint.html)** · **[EN 15804 explainers](https://oneclicklca.com/en/resources/articles/en-15804-changes-epds)**.

---

## 4) Economics: default values vs. one-time modeling

**Default values behave like an *annual fee* that scales with volume.**  
- **Liability formula (simplified):** `CBAM cost ≈ Embedded tCO₂e × Certificate price`  
- From **2026**, importers purchase **CBAM certificates** linked to **EU ETS** prices (definitive period). See **[Commission CBAM FAQ](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/system/files/2023-11/CBAM%20Frequently%20Asked%20Questions_November%202023.pdf)**.  
- If defaults exceed your real intensity, you **pay the spread every year**.

**One-time PCF model ≈ upfront + light refresh.**  
- **Capex-like**: build once, then quarterly/annual refresh when **energy mix**, **yields**, or **suppliers** shift.  
- **Benefits:** lower tax, faster clearance, fewer rejections, stronger pricing/credentialing with buyers.

---

## 5) Quick checklists

### Internal prep
- **Owners:** compliance · finance · production · procurement · logistics  
- **Templates:** BOM · energy · logistics · **factor register** (source/version/unit)  
- **Quality gates:** unit checks · boundary/time consistency · assumption flags  
- **Evidence policy:** minimal set · electronic · versioned

### External deliverables
- **Human-readable:** method · boundary · result · DQR · uncertainty · assumptions  
- **Machine-readable:** CSV/JSON mapped to buyer/customs fields  
- **Audit pack:** sources · screenshots/redacted docs · lineage export · change log  
- **Verification access:** QR/link with controlled permissions

---

## What Climate Seal does (in one page)
- **Faster:** ingest **BOM/energy/logistics**, auto-map rules & factors, run **batch PCF**, and output **one-click customs/buyer** reports (CBAM-ready).  
- **Credible:** every model ships with **data-quality scoring**, **uncertainty bands**, and **evidence packs**, aligned to ISO 14067/GHG Protocol Product Standard.  
- **Reusable:** the same PCF feeds **customs**, **tenders**, **audits**, and upgrades to **DPP/ESPR**, **PEF/EPD**.  
- **Actionable:** compare materials/process/suppliers to cut emissions *and* cost.

> **Call to action:** Want a **once-and-reusable PCF** for your top SKU? **[Book a Climate Seal walkthrough](https://climate-seal.com)** — we'll build a pilot and hand you the evidence pack.

# 别再用默认值：CBAM 的真实成本与一次建模的可复用 PCF 路径

**默认值不是捷径。** 它看似省事，但往往推高成本、增加海关审查概率、拖慢资金周转。更务实的做法是：**一次建模、反复复用的产品碳足迹（PCF）模型**，用于报关、买方投标与审计。

**本文包含：** 默认值成本 · HS 编码数据清单 · 一次建模路径 · 成本模型 · 快速清单

---

## 1）默认值的成本

- **更高的税负。** 过渡期默认值是**全球加权平均强度**；**自 2026 年**起将转为**按出口国平均 + 加价（mark-up）**的默认值。若你的真实工艺优于该基准，**缴费会被高估**。参见 **[CBAM 总览](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en)** 与 **[默认值说明](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/system/files/2023-12/Default%20values%20transitional%20period.pdf)**。  
- **更高的审计/复核风险。** 依赖估算/默认值更可能触发**复核与重报**，清关延误占用**营运资金**。  
- **丢失商业红利。** 承诺 **SBTi** 的买方需要**产品级**排放；用默认值无法体现**低碳 SKU** 优势，议价与中标都吃亏（见 **[SBTi 指南](https://sciencebasedtargets.org/standards-and-guidance)**）。  
- **管理层结论：** *默认值只是临时桥，不是长期策略。* 一边短期过渡，一边尽快建立可复用的专属 PCF。

---

## 2）HS 编码与最小化数据包

**当前 CBAM 涵盖的重点 HS/CN 段：**  
**钢铁**（HS **72**，部分 **73**）、**铝**（**76**）、**水泥**（HS **2523**）、**化肥**（**31**）、**氢**（**2804**）、**电力**（部门）。部门页：**[欧委会总览](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en)** · **[分行业信息](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism/cbam-information-sector_en)**。  
> **关于电池（HS 85）：** 当前不在 CBAM 范围，但在**买方要求 / DPP-ESPR / 电池法规**下是**高关注**品类；建议优先做 PCF 准备。参见 **[ESPR](https://commission.europa.eu/energy-climate-change-environment/standards-tools-and-labels/products-labelling-rules-and-requirements/ecodesign-sustainable-products-regulation_en)**。

**每个 HS/CN 的

（从摇篮到工厂大门）：**  
- **边界**（覆盖模块/阶段）与 **12 个月**参考期  
- **材料/BOM**（重量、牌号、损耗）  
- **工序能耗**（电力、燃料）  
- **主要物流**（关键来料与出境段）  
- **因子溯源**（来源、版本、单位；电网因子或供应商专属因子）  

**常见驳回点 → 修复：**  
- 边界错误 → 提供**边界示意图**与模块清单  
- 单位混乱 → **单位校验** + 统一**模板**  
- 因子缺来源 → 在因子表中**标注来源/版本**，维护**因子台账**

---

## 3）一次建模、处处复用的 PCF 路径

**输入：** 产品规格 / BOM / 能耗 / 物流。缺字段时，用**行业因子**并**显式标注假设**与不确定性。

**80/20 覆盖：** 先建**排放大头**（如高炉铁水、分解/煅烧、电解用电、初级锭、关键路段），长尾后迭代。

**交付物（可复用）：**  
- **结果 + 方法**（功能单位、系统边界、分配规则）  
- **因子表**（来源/版本/单位）、**数据血缘/来源链**  
- **数据质量评分（DQR）**与**不确定性区间**  
- **证据包**（发票/表计/截图等脱敏材料）

**复用场景：**  
- **海关**（CBAM 注册与填报）  
- **买方投标**（供应商专属 Scope 3）  
- **审计/核证**  
- 平滑升级到 **DPP/ESPR**、**PEF/EPD**（见 **[PEF 方法](https://eplca.jrc.ec.europa.eu/EnvironmentalFootprint.html)** · **[EN 15804 解读](https://oneclicklca.com/en/resources/articles/en-15804-changes-epds)**）

---

## 4）经济账：年度

vs 一次性建模

**默认值 ≈ 随销量线性增长的

。**  
- **简化公式：** `CBAM 成本 ≈ 嵌入 tCO₂e × 证书价格`  
- **自 2026 年**起，进口商购买与 **EU ETS** 价格挂钩的 **CBAM 证书**（进入正式期）。见 **[欧委会 CBAM FAQ](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/system/files/2023-11/CBAM%20Frequently%20Asked%20Questions_November%202023.pdf)**。  
- 若默认值高于你的真实强度，你就会**年年支付差额**。

**一次性 PCF 建模 ≈ 前期投入 + 轻量更新。**  
- 类似

：当 **电力结构/产能/收率/供应商** 变动时按季/年更新。  
- **收益：** 降低税负、加快通关、减少驳回、增强溢价与中标力。

---

## 5）快速清单

### 内部准备
- **责任人：** 合规 · 财务 · 生产 · 采购 · 物流  
- **模板：** BOM · 能耗 · 物流 · **因子台账**（来源/版本/单位）  
- **质量门：** 单位校验 · 边界/时间一致性 · 假设标注  
- **证据策略：** 最小集 · 电子化 · 版本化

### 对外交付
- **可读版：** 方法 · 边界 · 结果 · DQR · 不确定性 · 假设  
- **机器版：** CSV/JSON，字段映射到买方/海关  
- **审计包：** 来源 · 截图/脱敏文档 · 血缘导出 · 变更日志  
- **验证入口：** 带权限控制的 QR/链接

---

## Climate Seal 怎么帮你
- **更快：** 摄入 **BOM/能耗/物流**，自动映射规则与因子，**批量建模**并一键输出**海关/买方**报告（适配 CBAM）。  
- **更可信：** 模型自带**数据质量评分**、**不确定性区间**与**证据包**，对齐 ISO 14067 / GHG Protocol。  
- **更可复用：** 一次建模，复用到**报关、投标、审计**，并顺滑升级 **DPP/ESPR**、**PEF/EPD**。  
- **更可执行：** 材料/工艺/供应商并排对比，同时降**碳**又降**本**。

> **立即行动：** 想要一个**一次建模、到处复用**的 PCF？**[预约演示](https://climate-seal.com)**——我们用你的一个 SKU 打样并交付证据包。

# Product Carbon Footprint (PCF): a practical guide for teams that ship real products

> **TL;DR** — A *product carbon footprint (PCF)* totals the greenhouse-gas emissions (in CO₂e) of a **single product** across its life cycle. It's requested by buyers, used in programs like **CBAM**, and underpins construction **EPDs**. Calculate it with activity data × emission factors following **[ISO 14067](https://www.iso.org/standard/71206.html)** and the **[GHG Protocol Product Standard](https://ghgprotocol.org/product-standard)**.

**Jump to:** [What PCF means](#what-pcf-means) · [Where it's used](#where-pcfs-are-used) · [How to calculate](#how-a-pcf-is-calculated) · [Do you need it?](#do-you-need-a-pcf) · [Pitfalls](#common-pitfalls) · [Data checklist](#a-minimal-pcf-data-checklist) · [Climate Seal](#what-climate-seal-does) · [FAQ](#faq) · [Sources](#sources)

---

## What PCF means
A **product carbon footprint (PCF)** is the total GHG emissions associated with a *product* across defined life-cycle stages—typically raw materials, manufacturing, logistics, use, and end-of-life—reported in **CO₂e**.  
**Conceptual equation:** `PCF = Σ (activity data × emission factor)` across included stages, with clear **allocation**, **data quality**, and **uncertainty** rules per the standards.

Key rulebooks:
- **[ISO 14067](https://www.iso.org/standard/71206.html)** (built on ISO 14040/44 LCA principles)  
- **[GHG Protocol — Product Life Cycle Standard](https://ghgprotocol.org/product-standard)** (PDF: [direct link](https://ghgprotocol.org/sites/default/files/standards/Product-Life-Cycle-Accounting-Reporting-Standard_041613.pdf))

---

## Where PCFs are used
- **Customer & investor disclosure.** Buyers with **Science Based Targets (SBTi)** often require *product-level* emissions. SBTi criteria: when **Scope 3 ≥ 40%** of total emissions, targets must cover **≥ 67% of Scope 3** ([source](https://sciencebasedtargets.org/standards-and-guidance)).  
- **Regulation.** The EU's **[Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM)](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en)** has a transitional reporting phase (2023–2025); from **2026**, importers surrender CBAM certificates tied to embedded emissions.  
- **Construction & EPDs.** Environmental Product Declarations are based on PCF/LCA aligned with **EN 15804** (Type III declarations under ISO 14025). Good explainers: [One Click LCA](https://oneclicklca.com/en/resources/articles/en-15804-changes-epds) · [Circular Ecology](https://circularecology.com/en-15804-a2-epd-update.html).  
- **Voluntary claims & comparisons.** Early framework **[PAS 2050](https://knowledge.bsigroup.com/products/specification-for-the-assessment-of-the-life-cycle-greenhouse-gas-emissions-of-goods-and-services)** still informs practice.

---

## How a PCF is calculated
Follow **ISO 14067** / **GHG Protocol** steps:

1. **Goal & scope.** Define the product, **functional unit** (e.g.,

), reference year, assurance needs.  
2. **Life-cycle inventory (LCI).** Gather *primary data* (energy, fuel, yields, scrap, wastes, transport) and pair with vetted **emission factors** (materials, electricity, fuels, processes). Track **biogenic carbon** where relevant.  
3. **Allocation rules.** For multi-output processes, apply mass/energy/economic **allocation** or system expansion—document your choice.  
4. **Impact calculation.** Multiply **activity data × emission factors** for each stage; roll up to the functional unit.  
5. **Uncertainty & data quality.** Quantify representativeness and uncertainty; run sensitivity checks; consider third-party **critical review** for public claims.  
6. **Reporting.** Provide boundary diagrams, assumptions, allocation, data sources, and a reproducible calculation trail; for EPDs, follow the relevant **PCR** and verification rules.

> **PCF vs corporate inventory:** A *corporate* GHG inventory totals **Scope 1, 2, 3 emissions** for the company in a year. A **PCF** follows *one product* through its life cycle. PCFs enable apples-to-apples comparisons of designs/materials/suppliers and feed credible supplier-specific data into customers' Scope 3 reporting.

---

## Do you need a PCF?
You likely do if **any** apply:
- You sell into the EU and your goods contain **CBAM-covered** materials (steel, aluminum, cement, fertilizers, electricity, hydrogen).  
- Your customers ask for **product-level** emissions or are **SBTi-committed**.  
- You publish **EPDs** or market

SKUs in construction/industrial supply chains.  
- You want claims like *

* backed by **ISO 14067 / GHG Protocol**, not vague marketing.

If none apply, a corporate inventory may be enough *for now*—but a quick **screening PCF** on your top products usually reveals cost-saving hotspots.

---

## Common pitfalls
- **Mismatched boundaries.** Comparing cradle-to-gate with cradle-to-grave.  
- **Hidden allocation.** Changing allocation rules can flip

suppliers—state your rule and test sensitivity.  
- **Generic factors everywhere.** Electricity market mix, time-of-use, and supplier-specific data can be material.  
- **No audit trail.** Keep invoices, meters, calculation steps, and **uncertainty bands**—expected under ISO 14067/14040.

---

## A minimal PCF data checklist
- Product **BOM** (weights/yields) or recipe/formulation  
- **Energy** by process (meters/estimates), **fuel** use, utility contracts  
- **Process** throughput, scrap/rework, recovery  
- **Logistics** routes, modes, distances (inbound/outbound)  
- **Packaging** specs and **end-of-life** assumptions  
- Priority **supplier** contacts for high-impact inputs

---

## What Climate Seal does
*Get **credible PCFs fast**, then use them to win business and plan real reductions.*

- **Faster:** Auto-map rules & emission factors and run **batch PCF modeling** from your **BOM/energy/logistics** data—then generate **one-click buyer/customs reports** (useful for **CBAM**).  
- **Credible:** Each model includes a **0–100 data-quality score**, **uncertainty bands**, **auto-fix hints**, and **evidence packs** aligned with **ISO 14067** and the **GHG Protocol Product Standard**.  
- **Frictionless supplier data:** A **low-friction, low-cost pipeline** for **verification-grade supplier data**, plug-and-play for **SBTi** target tracking and **abatement planning**.  
- **Actionable:** Side-by-side comparisons of materials, processes, and suppliers so design, procurement, and finance can pick the **lowest-emissions** (often **lowest-cost**) option.

> **Call to action:** Want **audit-ready PCFs** without six months of spreadsheets? **[Book a Climate Seal walkthrough](https://climate-seal.com)** and we'll build a pilot on one of your SKUs.

---

## FAQ

**Carbon emission vs carbon footprint—what's the difference?**  
*Emissions* are the gases released (e.g., kg CO₂). A *footprint* is the **sum** of those emissions across a **boundary** (e.g., a product's life cycle).

**What are *Scope 1, 2, 3 emissions*?**  
Scope 1: direct fuel/process emissions; Scope 2: purchased energy; Scope 3: value-chain emissions (up/downstream). See the **[GHG Protocol](https://ghgprotocol.org/)**.

**What is *Science Based Targets* (SBTi)?**  
Targets aligned with climate science and validated by SBTi; when **Scope 3 ≥ 40%**, targets must cover **≥ 67% of Scope 3** ([criteria](https://sciencebasedtargets.org/standards-and-guidance)).

**How do PCFs relate to TCFD/ISSB?**  
**[TCFD recommendations](https://www.fsb-tcfd.org/recommendations/)** (now embedded in **[IFRS S2](https://www.ifrs.org/issued-standards/ifrs-sustainability-standards-navigator/ifrs-s2-climate-related-disclosures/)**) ask for decision-useful climate metrics; product-level data supports credible transition plans and capex choices.

**Do PCFs require *carbon offsets*?**  
No—PCF is an accounting result. Offsets (if used) are reported **separately**. Focus first on **abatement** (materials, energy, logistics).

**Where can I see *product carbon footprint examples*?**  
Construction **EPDs** (EN 15804) publish module-by-module footprints; many manufacturers share BOM-based examples in buyer portals.

---

## Sources
- ISO — **Carbon footprint of products (ISO 14067:2018)**: https://www.iso.org/standard/71206.html  
- GHG Protocol — **Product Life Cycle Standard** (overview): https://ghgprotocol.org/product-standard  
- GHG Protocol — **Product Life Cycle Standard (PDF)**: https://ghgprotocol.org/sites/default/files/standards/Product-Life-Cycle-Accounting-Reporting-Standard_041613.pdf  
- Science Based Targets — **Standards & Guidance**: https://sciencebasedtargets.org/standards-and-guidance  
- European Commission — **CBAM**: https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en  
- EN 15804 explainers: https://oneclicklca.com/en/resources/articles/en-15804-changes-epds , https://circularecology.com/en-15804-a2-epd-update.html  
- BSI — **PAS 2050**: https://knowledge.bsigroup.com/products/specification-for-the-assessment-of-the-life-cycle-greenhouse-gas-emissions-of-goods-and-services  
- TCFD — **Recommendations**: https://www.fsb-tcfd.org/recommendations/  
- IFRS — **ISSB/IFRS S2**: https://www.ifrs.org/issued-standards/ifrs-sustainability-standards-navigator/ifrs-s2-climate-related-disclosures/
articles.contentZh: # 产品碳足迹（PCF）：给真正

的团队的一份实用指南

> **要点速览** — A *product carbon footprint (PCF)* totals the greenhouse-gas emissions (in CO₂e) of a **single product** across its life cycle. It's requested by buyers, used in programs like **CBAM**, and underpins construction **EPDs**. Calculate it with activity data × emission factors following **[ISO 14067](https://www.iso.org/standard/71206.html)** and the **[GHG Protocol Product Standard](https://ghgprotocol.org/product-standard)**.

**快速导航：**[PCF 是什么](#pcf-是什么) · [应用场景](#pcf-的典型应用场景) · [如何计算](#如何计算-pcf) · [是否需要](#我是否需要-pcf) · [常见坑](#常见坑) · [数据清单](#最小化数据清单) · [Climate Seal 能做什么](#climate-seal-能做什么) · [常见问答](#常见问答) · [来源](#来源)

---

## PCF 是什么
**产品碳足迹（PCF）** 指与某一*产品*相关、在已定义的生命周期边界内产生的全部温室气体排放量（通常涵盖原材料、制造、物流、使用与报废等环节），以 **CO₂e** 表示。  
**概念公式：**`PCF = Σ（活动数据 × 排放因子）`，并按标准要求记录**分配方法**、**数据质量**与**不确定性**。

核心规则体系：
- **[ISO 14067](https://www.iso.org/standard/71206.html)**（基于 ISO 14040/44 生命周期评估原则）  
- **[GHG Protocol — 产品生命周期标准](https://ghgprotocol.org/product-standard)**（PDF： [直接下载](https://ghgprotocol.org/sites/default/files/standards/Product-Life-Cycle-Accounting-Reporting-Standard_041613.pdf)）

---

## PCF 的典型应用场景
- **客户/投资披露。** 许多承诺 **SBTi** 的买方会要求供应商提供*产品级*排放数据。SBTi 规则：当**范围三（Scope 3）≥ 企业总排放的 40%** 时，目标需覆盖**≥ 67% 的范围三排放**（[来源](https://sciencebasedtargets.org/standards-and-guidance)）。  
- **监管合规。** 欧盟 **[CBAM](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en)** 2023–2025 为过渡期；自 **2026 年**起，进口商需按产品

交纳证书。  
- **建筑与 EPD。** 建材的 **环境产品声明（EPD）** 基于 PCF/LCA，遵循 **EN 15804**（ISO 14025 下的 III 型声明）。可参考解读：[One Click LCA](https://oneclicklca.com/en/resources/articles/en-15804-changes-epds) · [Circular Ecology](https://circularecology.com/en-15804-a2-epd-update.html)。  
- **自愿声明与对比。** **[PAS 2050](https://knowledge.bsigroup.com/products/specification-for-the-assessment-of-the-life-cycle-greenhouse-gas-emissions-of-goods-and-services)** 是较早的通用规范，仍具有参考价值。

---

## 如何计算 PCF
依 **ISO 14067** / **GHG Protocol** 步骤进行：

1. **目标与范围。** 明确产品、**功能单位**（如

）、核算年度与是否需要第三方核证。  
2. **生命周期清单（LCI）。** 收集*一手数据*（能耗、燃料、产量、损耗、废弃、运输等），并匹配权威**排放因子**（材料、电力、燃料、工艺）；涉及**生物碳**时需单独跟踪。  
3. **分配规则。** 多联产/副产品情形下采用质量/能量/经济法分配或系统扩展，并记录理由。  
4. **影响计算。** 对各阶段执行

，按功能单位汇总。  
5. **不确定性与数据质量。** 评估代表性与不确定性，做敏感性分析；公开发布时建议进行**第三方评审**。  
6. **报告。** 提供边界图、假设、分配方法、数据来源与可复现的计算轨迹；若做 EPD，需遵循相应 **PCR** 与核查规则。

> **PCF 与公司盘查的区别：** 公司层面的温室气体盘查按年度汇总 **Scope 1/2/3**；**PCF** 则是跟随*单一产品*的全生命周期。两者互补：PCF 让材料/设计/供应商之间可做**同口径对比**，也为客户的范围三报告提供**供应商实测数据**。

---

## 我是否需要 PCF？
若**任一**情形成立，通常建议开展：
- 面向欧盟销售且产品涉及 **CBAM** 覆盖材料（钢、铝、水泥、化肥、电力、氢等）；  
- 客户主动索要**产品级**排放数据，或客户承诺 **SBTi**；  
- 需要发布 **EPD** 或宣传

型产品；  
- 希望以 **ISO 14067/GHG Protocol** 为依据，做出如

的可核查声明。

如暂不符合，可先做公司盘查；但对重点产品做一次**筛选级 PCF**，往往就能发现降本减排的热点。

---

## 常见坑
- **边界不一致**：把
的数值拿去和

对比；  
- **分配不透明**：更改分配法可能改变

排序；  
- **排放因子一刀切**：电力市场结构、用电时段与供应商专属数据可能是实质性差异；  
- **缺少审计轨迹**：需保留发票、仪表、计算步骤与**不确定性区间**。

---

## 最小化数据清单
- 产品 **BOM**（重量/收率）或配方  
- 各工序 **能耗**（表计或估算）、**燃料**消耗、购电/合同  
- **工艺**产能、返工/损耗、回收  
- **物流**路线/方式/距离（来料与出货）  
- **包装**参数与**处置**假设  
- 重点物料的**供应商**联系人（便于索取与核验数据）

---

## Climate Seal 能做什么
*在**更短时间**拿到**可核证**的 PCF，并用于赢单与减排决策。*

- **更快**：自动映射核算规则与排放因子，基于 **BOM/能耗/物流** 进行**批量 PCF 建模**，一键生成**买方/海关**所需报告（适配 **CBAM**）。  
- **更可信**：每个模型自带 **0–100 数据质量评分**、**不确定性区间**、**自动修正提示**与**证据包**；结果对齐 **ISO 14067** 与 **GHG Protocol**。  
- **更顺滑的供应链数据**：**低摩擦、低成本**的**供应商数据**采集与校验管道，直接用于 **SBTi** 目标跟踪与**减排规划**。  
- **更可执行**：材料/工艺/供应商的并排对比，帮助设计、采购与财务选择**最低排放**（往往也是**最低成本**）方案。

> **Call to action:** Want **audit-ready PCFs** without six months of spreadsheets? **[Book a Climate Seal walkthrough](https://climate-seal.com)** and we'll build a pilot on one of your SKUs.

---

## FAQ

**Carbon emission vs carbon footprint—what's the difference?**  
*Emissions* are the gases released (e.g., kg CO₂). A *footprint* is the **sum** of those emissions across a **boundary** (e.g., a product's life cycle).

**What are *Scope 1, 2, 3 emissions*?**  
Scope 1: direct fuel/process emissions; Scope 2: purchased energy; Scope 3: value-chain emissions (up/downstream). See the **[GHG Protocol](https://ghgprotocol.org/)**.

**What is *Science Based Targets* (SBTi)?**  
Targets aligned with climate science and validated by SBTi; when **Scope 3 ≥ 40%**, targets must cover **≥ 67% of Scope 3** ([criteria](https://sciencebasedtargets.org/standards-and-guidance)).

**How do PCFs relate to TCFD/ISSB?**  
**[TCFD recommendations](https://www.fsb-tcfd.org/recommendations/)** (now embedded in **[IFRS S2](https://www.ifrs.org/issued-standards/ifrs-sustainability-standards-navigator/ifrs-s2-climate-related-disclosures/)**) ask for decision-useful climate metrics; product-level data supports credible transition plans and capex choices.

**Do PCFs require *carbon offsets*?**  
No—PCF is an accounting result. Offsets (if used) are reported **separately**. Focus first on **abatement** (materials, energy, logistics).

**Where can I see *product carbon footprint examples*?**  
Construction **EPDs** (EN 15804) publish module-by-module footprints; many manufacturers share BOM-based examples in buyer portals.

# 别再用默认值：CBAM 的真实成本与一次建模的可复用 PCF 路径

**默认值不是捷径。** 它看似省事，但往往推高成本、增加海关审查概率、拖慢清关。更务实的做法是：**一次建模、反复复用的产品碳足迹（PCF）模型**，用于报关、买方投标与审计。

**本文包含：** 默认值成本 · HS 编码数据清单 · 一次建模路径 · 成本模型 · 快速清单

---

## 1）默认值的成本

- **更高的税负。** 欧委会在过渡期发布的默认值属**全球平均**强度；**自 2026 年**起将转为**按出口国平均 + 加价（mark-up）**的默认值。若你的真实工艺优于上述基准，交证书时你将**被高估**。参见 **[CBAM 总览](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en)** 与 **[默认值说明](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/system/files/2023-12/Default%20values%20transitional%20period.pdf)**。  
- **更高的审计/复核风险。** 依赖估算/默认值更可能触发**复核与重报**，返工占用**营运资金**，并可能延误出货。  
- **丢失商业红利。** 承诺 **SBTi** 的买方需要**产品级**排放；用默认值无法体现**低碳 SKU** 优势，议价与中标都会受限（见 **[SBTi 指南](https://sciencebasedtargets.org/standards-and-guidance)**）。  
- **管理层结论：** *默认值是过渡桥，不是策略。* 边用边建专属、可证据支撑的 PCF。

---

## 2）HS 编码与最小化数据包

**当前 CBAM 涵盖的重点 HS/CN 段：**  
**钢铁**（HS **72**，部分 **73**）、**铝**（**76**）、**水泥**（HS **2523**）、**化肥**（**31**）、**氢**（**2804**）、**电力**（部门）。部门页：**[欧委会总览](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en)** · **[分行业信息](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism/cbam-information-sector_en)**。  
> **关于电池（HS 85）：** 当前不在 CBAM 范围，但在**买方要求 / DPP-ESPR / 电池法规**下为**高关注**品类，建议优先准备 PCF。参见 **[ESPR](https://commission.europa.eu/energy-climate-change-environment/standards-tools-and-labels/products-labelling-rules-and-requirements/ecodesign-sustainable-products-regulation_en)**。

**每个 HS/CN 的

（从摇篮到工厂大门）：**  
- **边界**（覆盖模块/阶段）与 **12 个月**参考期  
- **材料/BOM**（重量、牌号、收率）  
- **工序能耗**（电力、燃料）  
- **主要物流**（关键来料与出口段）  
- **因子溯源**（来源/版本/单位；电网因子或供应商专属因子）  

**常见拒件 → 修复：**  
- 边界错误 → 提供**边界示意图**与模块清单  
- 单位混乱 → **单位校验** + 统一**模板**  
- 因子无来源 → 在因子表中**标注来源/版本**，维护**因子台账**

---

## 3）一次建模、处处复用的 PCF 路径

**输入：** 产品规格 / BOM / 能耗 / 物流。缺字段时，用**行业因子**并**显式标注假设**与不确定性。

**80/20 覆盖：** 先建**排放大头**（如高炉铁水、分解/煅烧、电解用电、初级锭、关键路段），长尾后迭代。

**交付物（可复用）：**  
- **结果 + 方法**（功能单位、系统边界、分配规则）  
- **因子表**（来源/版本/单位）、**数据血缘**  
- **数据质量评分（DQR）**与**不确定性区间**  
- **证据包**（发票/表计/截图等脱敏材料）

**复用场景：**  
- **海关**（CBAM 注册与填报）  
- **买方投标**（供应商专属 Scope 3）  
- **审计/核证**  
- 平滑升级至 **DPP/ESPR**、**PEF/EPD**（见 **[PEF 方法](https://eplca.jrc.ec.europa.eu/EnvironmentalFootprint.html)** · **[EN 15804 解读](https://oneclicklca.com/en/resources/articles/en-15804-changes-epds)**）

---

## 4）经济账：年度

vs 一次性建模

**默认值 ≈ 随销量线性增长的

。**  
- **简化公式：** `CBAM 成本 ≈ 嵌入 tCO₂e × 证书价格`  
- **自 2026 年**起，进口商购买与 **EU ETS** 价格挂钩的 **CBAM 证书**（进入正式期）。见 **[CBAM FAQ](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/system/files/2023-11/CBAM%20Frequently%20Asked%20Questions_November%202023.pdf)**。  
- 若默认值高于你的真实强度，你会**年年支付差额**。

**一次性 PCF 建模 ≈ 前期投入 + 轻量更新。**  
- 可视作

：当 **电力结构/产能/收率/供应商** 变动时按季/年更新。  
- **收益：** 税负下降、通关更稳、拒件更少、议价更强。

---

## 5）快速清单

### 内部准备
- **责任人：** 合规 · 财务 · 生产 · 采购 · 物流  
- **模板：** BOM · 能耗 · 物流 · **因子台账**（来源/版本/单位）  
- **质量门槛：** 单位校验 · 边界/时间一致性 · 假设标注  
- **证据策略：** 最小集 · 电子化 · 版本化

### 对外交付
- **可读版：** 方法 · 边界 · 结果 · DQR · 不确定性 · 假设  
- **机器版：** CSV/JSON，字段映射到买方/海关  
- **审计包：** 来源 · 截图/打码单据 · 血缘导出 · 变更日志  
- **验证入口：** 带权限控制的 QR/链接

---

**行动号召：** 想在几周内用 **PCF** 替代默认值？**[预约演示](https://climate-seal.com)** —— 我们用你的一个 SKU 打样，并展示如何扩展到全品类与供应商链条。

articles.excerptZh: ISO 与 GHG Protocol 宣布对齐现有标准并联合制定 PCF 规则，减少重复与审计不确定性，提升供应商数据可比性。
articles.content:
On 9 September 2025, ISO and the Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Protocol announced a strategic partnership to harmonize existing greenhouse gas accounting standards and co-develop new ones. This is not a merger of organizations. It is a plan to deliver a dual-logo, unified portfolio that reduces duplication, conflicting interpretations, and audit uncertainty for companies and assurance providers.

What is changing

- **One aligned suite:** ISO 1406x will be aligned with the GHG Protocol Corporate, Scope 2, and Scope 3 standards under a dual-logo framework.

- **A joint Product Carbon Footprint (PCF) standard:** The partners will co-develop a PCF standard to support high-granularity value chain data that informs real decarbonization decisions.

- **An integrated technical process:** Experts from both groups will run an integrated process to deliver cohesive, globally usable standards that support policy interoperability and assurance.

Why it matters (for sustainability and business teams)

- **Fewer crosswalks:** Teams that map between ISO 1406x and GHG Protocol should see fewer re-baselines, fewer duplicate reports, and clearer audit trails as alignment lands.

- **Cleaner supplier data exchange:** A joint PCF standard is expected to clarify key fields (system boundaries, allocation choices, land use change, recycled content, biogenic carbon, primary data) and improve comparability across sectors and software.

- **Policy and market usability:** The move responds to calls from the B7 business community and aligns with the ISSB push for a global baseline, leading to more consistent, comparable carbon data for investors and regulators.

What to do this quarter

1) **Stay the course and document assumptions:** Keep reporting to your current framework(s). Record organizational/operational boundaries, activity data sources, emission factor provenance, allocation rules, and Scope 2 market/location methods to make future mapping smoother.

2) **Build a field-level dual-standard data model:** Crosswalk your current fields to ISO 1406x and GHG Protocol Corporate/Scope 2/Scope 3, and leave placeholders for the upcoming joint PCF fields.

3) **Prioritize supplier primary data:** Standardize questionnaires and focus first on categories with high spend/emissions and weaker data quality.

4) **Design for auditability:** Centralize evidence (meters, invoices, MWh, t-km, allocation rationales) with metadata and lineage so third-party assurance can test once, not twice.

How Climate Seal helps (right now)

- **Automate PCFs from BOMs and supplier inputs with transparent, traceable data lineage.**

- **Map once, export twice:** Produce audit-ready outputs aligned with ISO 1406x and GHG Protocol today, positioning you for an easy transition to the dual-logo standards.

- **Accelerate supplier data collection with structured requests and built-in validation hints to improve quality at the source.**

**Ready to simplify your PCFs process?** [Book a 30‑min readiness demo](/demo?utm_source=website&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=basic)

## Sources

- [ISO media release (PDF)](https://www.iso.org/files/live/sites/isoorg/files/news/News_archive/2025/09/iso-and-ghgp-partnership/ISO%20and%20GHGP_FINAL_EN.pdf)

- [GHG Protocol press release](https://ghgprotocol.org/blog/release-iso-and-ghg-protocol-announce-strategic-partnership-deliver-unified-global-standards)

- [PR Newswire distribution](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/iso-and-ghg-protocol-announce-strategic-partnership-to-deliver-unified-global-standards-for-greenhouse-gas-emissions-accounting-302549788.html)

- [ESG Today coverage](https://www.esgtoday.com/iso-ghg-protocol-unify-standards-for-measuring-and-reporting-emissions/)

- [Carbon Market Watch/ECOS commentary](https://carbonmarketwatch.org/2025/09/09/harmonisation-of-iso-and-ghg-p-standards-must-raise-the-quality-bar/)
articles.contentZh:
9 September 2025，ISO 与 GHG Protocol 正式宣布建立战略合作伙伴关系，计划协调现有温室气体核算标准组合，并共同制定新的测量与报告标准。这不是机构合并，而是一次对方法学与治理流程的深度对齐，目标是推出带有双标识的统一标准组合，减少企业在多套规则之间来回切换所造成的重复工作与审计不确定性。

到底在改变什么

- **统一的标准组合：**ISO 1406x 系列将与 GHG Protocol 的 Corporate、Scope 2、Scope 3 标准对齐，并以双标识 形式发布。

- **联合的产品碳足迹标准（PCF）：**双方将共同开发新的 PCF 标准，以支持价值链高颗粒度数据的采集与使用，帮助企业做出更有效的减碳决策。

- **一体化技术流程：**来自两方的专家将通过综合的技术与治理流程，持续交付连贯、可核查、可与政策衔接的标准。

为什么重要（给业务与可持续团队的直白版）

- **更少的交叉对照：**过去需要在 ISO 1406x 与 GHG Protocol 之间做映射与复算。对齐后，有望减少重基线与重复披露，审计口径更清晰。

- **供应商数据更可比：**联合的 PCF 标准有望明确系统边界、分配规则、土地利用变化、再生成分、源数据粒度等关键字段，使跨行业与软件平台的数据交换更顺畅。

- **更强的政策与市场可用性：**这一步回应了 B7 商界倡议与 ISSB 全球基线的呼吁，为投资者与监管者提供更一致、可比的碳数据。

本季度建议行动

1) **保持现有披露，但把依据写清楚：**完整记录组织与运营边界、活动数据来源、因子出处、分配方法，以及 Scope 2 的市场与地理口径，方便未来平滑映射到统一标准。

2) **建一个"字段级"双标准数据模型：**将现用字段与 ISO 1406x、GHG Protocol Corporate/Scope 2/Scope 3 做一一对应，并预留即将到来的联合 PCF 字段位。

3) **抓供应链主战场：**把问卷和数据请求模板标准化，优先覆盖排放/支出占比高且数据质量薄弱的品类与工序，推动更多一手数据（primary data）。

4) **为审计准备证据链：**把仪表读数、发票、MWh、t-km、分配依据等凭证集中管理并标注元数据与来源路径，让第三方一次性可检，不必两套口径各验一遍。

Climate Seal 能帮你什么（现在就能做的）

- **从 BOM 与供应商输入自动生成 PCF，并保留透明、可追踪的数据血缘。**

- **Map once, export twice：**今天即可输出与 ISO 1406x 和 GHG Protocol 同步对齐的合规材料，为未来双标识统一标准的切换留好余地。

- **加速供应商数据收集：**用结构化请求与内置校验提示，减少来回沟通，提高源头数据质量。
